errors.400.headline: Required Permissions Needed
errors.400.descriptionLine1: In order to allow Strafforts to access your Strava data correctly, all required permissions need to be ticked.
errors.400.descriptionLine2: Please return to homepage and try again.
errors.401.headline: Session Expired
errors.401.descriptionLine1: For security reasons, Strava forces an access token update every 6 hours.
errors.401.descriptionLine2: Please return to homepage and login again.
errors.403.headline: Access Denied
errors.403.descriptionLine1: Unfortunately you don't have the permissions to perform this task.
errors.403.descriptionLine2: If you believe this was a mistake, please contact us with your athlete ID.
errors.404.headline: Page Not Found
errors.404.descriptionLine1: We could not find the page you were looking for. Meanwhile, you may return to homepage or contact us.
errors.404.descriptionLine2: If this is your athlete page, please try go back homepage and re-connect with Strava.
errors.500.headline: Internal Server Error
errors.500.descriptionLine1: We have been notified and will fix this right away.
errors.500.descriptionLine2: Meanwhile, you may return to homepage or contact us if the problem persists.
errors.503.headline: Strava Service Unavailable
errors.503.descriptionLine1: Strava did not respond to our request accordingly. Their authentication server maybe be out of service temporarily.
home.parallax.headline: Analyse Your Strava Running Best Efforts, PBs/PRs and Races
home.parallax.descriptionLine2: Strafforts is an analytics app to visualize your Strava running best efforts, PBs/PRs and races, which helps you better understand your performance.
home.sectionIdea.title: The Idea
home.sectionIdea.paragraph1: How many times have you wondered...
home.sectionIdea.paragraph2: What's my half marathon PB progression like? What're my fastest shoes for a 10K race? How many 5K races do I do every year? How often do I set a marathon PB?...
home.sectionIdea.paragraph3: Wish Strava had all those analysis built-in!
home.sectionIdea.paragraph4: No worries at all. Strafforts was born to visualize those data in forms of data tables, line charts, pie charts etc. to help you understand how you perform!
home.sectionDemo.title: The Demo
home.sectionGuarantees.title: The Guarantees
home.sectionGuarantees.paragraph1: Strafforts uses Strava's OAuth2 authentication protocol and v2 API to fetch your running best efforts, personal bests and races data, then visualize them and present back to you.
home.sectionGuarantees.paragraph2: The process doesn't require to store your Strava password at all and would never store any sensitive information. To further give you a peace of mind, you can easily delete all running data on Strafforts servers anytime.
home.sectionGuarantees.privacy.title: Privacy
home.sectionGuarantees.privacy.descripti: We never modify your Strava data or store sensitive data (Strava password, credit cards, etc.)
home.sectionGuarantees.openSource.title: Open Source
home.sectionGuarantees.openSource.descri: We are forever open source and currently licensed under GNU Affero General Public License v3.0
home.sectionGuarantees.support.title: Support
home.sectionGuarantees.support.descripti: I will try my best to answer any queries via email, Facebook, GitHub or even on my Strava profile
home.sectionTeam.title: The Team
home.sectionTeam.teamMember1Description: Very amateur runner. Strava addict. Strafforts founder, creator, coder, marketer and the customer service guy.
home.sectionTeam.teamMember2Description: Underachieved runner. Not yet a cyclist or swimmer. But keen on coding and working in start-ups. Happy father of two.
